```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = TRUE,
	warning = FALSE,
	fig.width = 8, 
  fig.height = 6,
  out.width = "90%"
)
options(
  ggplot2.continuous.colour = "viridis",
  ggplot2.continuous.fill = "viridis"
)
scale_colour_discrete = scale_colour_viridis_d
scale_fill_discrete = scale_fill_viridis_d
theme_set(theme_bw() + theme(legend.position = "bottom"))

```

```{r}
# bee population for country by year
year_state_bee = 
clean_bee_data %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  mutate(colony_per_year = sum(honey_producing_colonies))

year_state_bee %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = colony_per_year)) + 
  geom_line() 
```
